item.soulland.increase_max_soul_power_pi: Increase Max Soul Power Pill Recipe
Increase Max Soul Power Pill Recipe
§lOrigin§r
In my wanderings through the Southern Miasma Realms, I witnessed mountain folk combining *Soulverdant Herb*, *Moonshadow Creeper*, and *Crimsol Sunfruit* to mend fractured spirits. Observing their synergy with the Three Powers

§lOrigin§r
Doctrine, I refined the crude recipe through Nine Revolutions in the Emberforge Crucible. Though lacking ancient celestial grandeur, this elixir’s accessible ingredients make it attainable for common cultivators.

§lPill Efficacy§r
For those whose ethereal essence trembles after spiritual combat: Ingestion flows like sipping celestial nectar, sealing soul-fractures within three celestial hours, anchoring dissipating consciousness.

§lPill Recipe§r
In Alchemy Furnace,

increase_max_soul_power_pill_recipe.cont:
§lOrigin§r
While meditating on tidal rhythms within the Eastern Sea’s Abyssal Grotto, I witnessed three sacred specimens pulsing with lunar essence. By harmonizing their triune essence with Yin-Yang alchemy and refining them in earth-vein flames,

§lOrigin§r
I forged this pill to amplify cultivation. Though it cannot defy heaven’s decree, its balanced potency aids disciples from Foundation Establishment to Golden Core.

§lPill Efficacy§r
Upon consumption, the pill dissolves into nine solar meridians, circulating through rare channels. Within three dawns, it refines tenfold the spiritual energy of ordinary cultivation, purging meridian stagnation.
